name: Soporific: A Bedtime Story
description:
Welcome to Soporific: A Bedtime Story!

You are the parent of a precocious three-year-old and, despite all protests, it is bedtime. Make up a story to lull your child to sleep before running out of steam yourself! Bore them with a yarn from the farm, pull together a superhero story, or whatever it takes. But don’t get carried away—we don’t have all night.

Credits:

  • Ben Gemmel – art/ux
  • Karlyn Meyer – writing, design, audio
  • Stephen Meyer – code/tech, writing
  • G. Meyer, age 3 – voice, inspiration

Please Note: "Soporific_LudumDareSubmission_Final3" was completed before the Jam ended. "Soporific_LudumFinal_PlusPostJamBugFixes" and the Web Build include several small bug fixes (mostly incorrect links in the dialog and sounds playing at the wrong time) from the day after the jam ended.
